=== Why underscores instead of CamelCase ===

  * It's easier to spot common mistakes like FileName vs. getFilename or Hashtable vs. HashTable

=== A summarizing example ===

{{{
Return_Type function_name()
{
  Type_Name variable_name;
}
}}}
